Package com.example.project_3

Class Profile

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_3.Profile
public class Profile extends Object
Represents a user profile with various details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Profile(String name, String contact_info, String social_link, String profileType)

    Constructs a profile with specified details, including associated events.

  • Constructor Details

    • Profile

      public Profile(String image, String name, String contact_info, String social_link, String profileType)
      Constructs a profile with specified details including a profile picture.
      Parameters:
      image - The base64-encoded string representing the profile picture.
      name - The name of the user.
      contact_info - The contact information of the user.
      social_link - The social media link of the user.
      profileType - The type of profile (e.g., attendee, organizer).

    • Profile

      public Profile(String name, String contact_info, String social_link, String profileType)
      Constructs a profile with specified details excluding a profile picture.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      contact_info - The contact information of the user.
      social_link - The social media link of the user.
      profileType - The type of profile (e.g., attendee, organizer).

    • Profile

      public Profile(String name, String contact_info, String social_link, String profileType, ArrayList<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference> EventRefs)
      Constructs a profile with specified details, including associated events.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      contact_info - The contact information of the user.
      social_link - The social media link of the user.
      profileType - The type of profile (e.g., attendee, organizer).
      EventRefs - The list of document references to events associated with the user.
